#summary How to install the Crypt class?
#labels Phase-Deploy

== Downloading the packages ==

=== [http://cryptclass.googlecode.com/files/cryptclass_v2.2.tar.bz2 tar.bz2 package]: ===
 {{{
 $ wget http://cryptclass.googlecode.com/files/cryptclass_v2.2.tar.bz2
 $ tar xvjpf cryptclass_v2.2.tar.bz2
 $ cp -r cryptclass_v2.2 /your/application/path
 }}}

=== [http://cryptclass.googlecode.com/files/cryptclass_v2.2.tar.gz tar.gz package]:===
{{{
$ wget http://cryptclass.googlecode.com/files/cryptclass_v2.2.tar.bz2
$ tar xvjpf cryptclass_v2.2.tar.bz2
$ cp -r cryptclass_v2.2 /your/application/path
}}}

=== [http://cryptclass.googlecode.com/files/cryptclass_v2.2.zip zip package]: ===

== From the SVN ==

{{{
$ svn checkout http://cryptclass.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ /your/application/path/Crypt
}}}
